note:
IZ Digital is the digital offshoot of Interzone. It publishes fiction and non-fiction from all over the planet. Every story is illustrated with full-colour art. If you would like your story to be considered for publication in IZ Digital, take a look at our submission guidelines. I am very keen to see fiction submissions from all voices, whoever and wherever you are, so please do not self-reject.

Thank you for reading and supporting Interzone and IZ Digital.

— Gareth Jelley, Editor & Publisher
